mission: At Tricityauto, we make financing your used car in Ontario easy and affordable. Whether you have bad credit, no credit, or are somewhere in between, our flexible loan options and competitive rates ensure you can drive away with confidence in the car of your dreams.

steps.stepOneDescription: Start by completing our secure online credit application. Once submitted, one of our finance experts will call you quickly. Within 24 hours, we will connect you with our network of lenders and provide you with the status of your approval, bringing you one step closer to driving the car of your dreams.
steps.stepThreeDescription: Choose from our range of cars, minivans, SUVs, hatchbacks, or sedans with the help of our sales representative. We will handle the paperwork and finalize everything with the bank. Once ready, you can pick up your new car or have it delivered for free anywhere in Ontario.
steps.stepThreeTitle: Choose Your Car and Get It Delivered
steps.stepTwoDescription: With our 0% rejection policy, you have guaranteed approval. Our credit specialists will quickly match you with the best lender in our extensive network, usually within a few hours, ensuring you get the best financing option for your needs.
steps.title: Get Your Car in 3 Simple Steps

whyChooseTricity.content: When it comes to buying or financing a car, you have many options. At Tricity, we are committed to making your car buying experience smooth and enjoyable. Your satisfaction is our top priority; we are here to ensure you leave happy.
